channel.title: Connection lost
channel.description: im not sure whats going on but every time i try and log on i get "connection lost". the very first time i logged in i stayed in long enough to spawn some dragon items but after that i couldnt get back on long enough. i also do not know how to get on other servers =(

item.title: Connection lost
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Yeah what he said :rolleyes:…

Now to log on other servers go to the RS2 Server Advertisment section. They should have the information on there server there.

Example:

UserName: [YourUser]
PassWord: [YourPassword]
Server IP: [IP To Server]

Some servers require Hamachi, get it here,

https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.asp

For port- File–> New Port enter port there.

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Connection lost
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The server Re-STarts or Crashes, You just need to wait

Read full topic
